import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

[Ed25519](https://ed25519.cr.yp.to.md) is a widely adopted digital signature algorithm known for its strong security and
efficiency. Signing with Ed25519 ensures data _integrity_, authenticity, and non-repudiation. When signing with Ed25519,
a private key generates a digital signature that can be verified with the corresponding public key. This
process guarantees that the data has not been tampered with and originated from the private key's holder.

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Create a [`StrongholdSecretManager`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/client/secret/stronghold/type.StrongholdSecretManager.html) with the `STRONGHOLD_PASSWORD` and `MNEMONIC` variables in your `.env` file.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/sign_and_verify_ed25519/sign_ed25519.rs#L33-L39
```

</div>

2. Use the [`SecretManager`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/client/secret/enum.SecretManager.html) to sign the `FOUNDRY_METADATA` message as bytes using the [`StrongholdAdapter.sign_ed25519()`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/client/stronghold/struct.StrongholdAdapter.html#method.sign_ed25519) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/sign_and_verify_ed25519/sign_ed25519.rs#L46-L49
```

</div>

3. Hash the public key to get the address using the [`hex_public_key_to_bech32_address()`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/client/utils/fn.hex_public_key_to_bech32_address.html) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/sign_and_verify_ed25519/sign_ed25519.rs#L57
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Create a [`StrongholdSecretManager`](../../references/nodejs/interfaces/StrongholdSecretManager.md) with the `STRONGHOLD_PASSWORD` and `MNEMONIC` variables in your `.env` file.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/sign_and_verify_ed25519/sign-ed25519.ts#L41-L51
```

</div>

2. Use the [`SecretManager`](../../references/nodejs/classes/SecretManager.md) to sign the `FOUNDRY_METADATA` message as bytes using the [`SecretManager.signEd25519()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/SecretManager.md#signed25519) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/sign_and_verify_ed25519/sign-ed25519.ts#L53-L63
```

</div>

3. Hash the public key to get the address using the [`Utils.hexPublicKeyToBech32Address()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Utils.md#hexpublickeytobech32address) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/sign_and_verify_ed25519/sign-ed25519.ts#L68-L71
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

1. Create a [`StrongholdSecretManager`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/secret_manager/secret_manager.md#strongholdsecretmanager-objects) with the `STRONGHOLD_PASSWORD` and `MNEMONIC` variables in your `.env` file.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/sign_and_verify_ed25519/sign_ed25519.py#L20-L27
```

</div>

2. Use the [`SecretManager`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/secret_manager/secret_manager.md) to sign the `FOUNDRY_METADATA` message as bytes using the [`SecretManager.sign_ed25519()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/secret_manager/secret_manager.md#sign_ed25519) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/sign_and_verify_ed25519/sign_ed25519.py#L29-L37
```

</div>

3. Hash the public key to get the address using the [`Utils.hex_public_key_to_bech32_address()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/utils.md#hex_public_key_to_bech32_address) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/sign_and_verify_ed25519/sign_ed25519.py#L41-L42
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>
